snippet: Twitter reacted to the Cardinals-Astros hacking news as Twitter often reacts to sports stories: with witticisms, a sense of schadenfreude and Patriots jokes.
lead_paragraph: Twitter reacted to the Cardinals-Astros hacking news as Twitter often reacts to sports stories: with witticisms, a sense of schadenfreude and Patriots jokes.

headline.main: Belichick, Snowden and Hack Wilson: Twitter Reacts to Cardinals Scandal
